channel.title: Any one still play EoC?
channel.description:
Hey, since eoc came, I recently remembered an account left on one of my emails, its pretty good, I will post pictures in a few. Its a pure with one defense, I went through the EoC tutorial thing and noticed its a P.O.S. Now.
So I have a few questions, Does any one play? If so, add me I have 3 friends because I got hacked a year ago -user name: Why 1 Def Is members still worth it, with it being eight bucks now and all? I got 99 rc when people used to run nats, is it still worth it to do that? Last but not least *for now* is should I level defense, and if so, to what level?
P.s. someone should loan me 5m or something. Haha
Pics:
Does anyone here have a clan chat that I can join?
COMING SOON ;)

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I can’t play with my current setup but my intentions are to build a new computer sometime next year hopefully.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:15, topic:522881”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=641376.msg4321086#msg4321086 date=1372222876]
When I was getting 99 when it came out, I was getting 1.5m+ xp per day at 85+.
[/quote]
How many hours a day?[/quote]
Uhm, probably like 6-8.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:16, topic:522881”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=641376.msg4321083#msg4321083 date=1372222554]

P.s. someone should loan me 5m or something. Haha

Gold is $0.30 per mil on playerauctions, and you could definitely get it cheaper elsewhere
[/quote]

Also very much against the rules. I’m a little astonished that is your first response on how to acquire gold[/quote]
He was asking to borrow an amount that you could buy with loose change stuck in the couch. It is certainly a valid idea

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

When I was getting 99 when it came out, I was getting 1.5m+ xp per day at 85+.

How many hours a day?

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:12, topic:522881”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=641376.msg4321038#msg4321038 date=1372216373]

I love EoC. I have never played as a non member once I became a member. Just cannot do it, members is too great. 8 dollars is worth it in my opinion. That’s about a quarter a day. I can find that on the street. 99 rc has become meaningless with the runespan update. Nats are only like 140 gp ea now. I’m not a pker so go for 99 defence. I don’t know what level you should shoot for but defense does play a huge role in runescape now.

Runespan has been nerfed a couple of times, so the xp isn’t as great as when it was released. But of course, it’s still faster than going to altars.
[/quote]
I was getting 90k-110k exp/h at 80 rc and I’ve heard rates of 140k exp at 99. When was it nerfed? I always thought it was those rates as those are extremely fast compared to say 45k exp/h making combination runes.[/quote]
When I was getting 99 when it came out, I was getting 1.5m+ xp per day at 85+.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Lots of people still play, we have this entire section devoted to those who do

supaz:

P.s. someone should loan me 5m or something. Haha

Gold is $0.30 per mil on playerauctions, and you could definitely get it cheaper elsewhere

The Wanderer:

I was getting 90k-110k exp/h at 80 rc and I’ve heard rates of 140k exp at 99. When was it nerfed? I always thought it was those rates as those are extremely fast compared to say 45k exp/h making combination runes.

Those rates are pushing it, but it can still be accomplished. After they made it more luck based the XP dropped significantly

Read full topic

I love EoC. I have never played as a non member once I became a member. Just cannot do it, members is too great. 8 dollars is worth it in my opinion. That’s about a quarter a day. I can find that on the street. 99 rc has become meaningless with the runespan update. Nats are only like 140 gp ea now. I’m not a pker so go for 99 defence. I don’t know what level you should shoot for but defense does play a huge role in runescape now.
[/quote]
Runespan has been nerfed a couple of times, so the xp isn’t as great as when it was released. But of course, it’s still faster than going to altars.[/quote]
I was getting 90k-110k exp/h at 80 rc and I’ve heard rates of 140k exp at 99. When was it nerfed? I always thought it was those rates as those are extremely fast compared to say 45k exp/h making combination runes.

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

The Wanderer:

I love EoC. I have never played as a non member once I became a member. Just cannot do it, members is too great. 8 dollars is worth it in my opinion. That’s about a quarter a day. I can find that on the street. 99 rc has become meaningless with the runespan update. Nats are only like 140 gp ea now. I’m not a pker so go for 99 defence. I don’t know what level you should shoot for but defense does play a huge role in runescape now.

Runespan has been nerfed a couple of times, so the xp isn’t as great as when it was released. But of course, it’s still faster than going to altars.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one still play EoC?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:522881”]i played on a 10hp 99 magic skiller thing but quit after eoc due to not being able to cannon for range.

i would get on every now and then to gamble, but now i cbf due to the mutes
so now i get on once a day to flip items in the grand exchange[/quote]
Cannon does give ranged exp.

[quote=“supaz, post:1, topic:522881”]Hey, since eoc came, I recently remembered an account left on one of my emails, its pretty good, I will post pictures in a few.
Its a pure with one defense, I went through the EoC tutorial thing and noticed its a P.O.S. Now.

So I have a few questions,
Does any one play? If so, add me I have 3 friends because I got hacked a year ago
-user name: Why 1 Def
Is members still worth it, with it being eight bucks now and all?
I got 99 rc when people used to run nats, is it still worth it to do that?
Last but not least for now is should I level defense, and if so, to what level?

P.s. someone should loan me 5m or something. Haha

Pics:

Does anyone here have a clan chat that I can join?

COMING SOON ;)[/quote]
I love EoC. I have never played as a non member once I became a member. Just cannot do it, members is too great. 8 dollars is worth it in my opinion. That’s about a quarter a day. I can find that on the street. 99 rc has become meaningless with the runespan update. Nats are only like 140 gp ea now. I’m not a pker so go for 99 defence. I don’t know what level you should shoot for but defense does play a huge role in runescape now.

Read full topic
